name: Place keeping - the vital role of long-term open space management
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: "There has long been a focus in urban landscape planning and design on the creation of high-quality public spaces, or place-making. Large amounts of capital continue to be spent on creating such spaces, without adequate thought given to, or resources made available for, the long-term maintenance and management of public spaces of place-keeping" Nicola Dempsey and Mel Burton, 'Defining place-keeping: the long-term management of public spaces'

presentations.name: Partnership and community responsibility for long term gains
presentations.speakers: Dr Nicola Dempsey, University of Sheffield

presentations.name: Designing for the long term with the user and maintenance in mind
Partnership working for town centre vitality
presentations.speakers: Martin Blackwell, CEO Association of Town Centre Management
